emerging_technologies.name: Self-Regulating AI Agents
emerging_technologies.description: AI agents capable of self-regulation, adapting their behavior based on ethical guidelines and real-time environmental feedback.
emerging_technologies.societal_implications: Reduces need for human oversight in AI operations, raises questions about AI rights and responsibilities.
emerging_technologies.adoption_factors: Need for ethical AI, legal frameworks for AI autonomy, technological breakthroughs in machine learning.

emerging_technologies.name: Haptic AI Interfaces
emerging_technologies.description: Advanced interfaces allowing AI agents to communicate through touch, enhancing user interaction in VR and daily life.
emerging_technologies.societal_implications: Improves accessibility for visually impaired, potential for over-reliance on technology.
emerging_technologies.adoption_factors: Advancements in sensor tech, VR market growth, consumer demand for immersive experiences.

emerging_technologies.name: Decentralized Agent Networks
emerging_technologies.description: A network of AI agents operating on decentralized systems, ensuring autonomy and security through blockchain.
emerging_technologies.societal_implications: Promotes data sovereignty, challenges traditional centralized control structures.
emerging_technologies.adoption_factors: Regulatory changes, growth in blockchain technology, need for secure and transparent AI systems.

mainstream_technologies.name: AI-Assisted Decision Making
mainstream_technologies.description: AI systems that provide real-time decision support to humans, enhancing efficiency and reducing cognitive load.
mainstream_technologies.adoption_status: Widespread in business, healthcare, and personal life. Legal frameworks are adapting to AI's role in decision-making.

mainstream_technologies.name: Autonomous Vehicles
mainstream_technologies.description: Fully autonomous vehicles for personal and public transport, reducing accidents, and optimizing traffic flow.
mainstream_technologies.adoption_status: Integrated into urban infrastructure, with ongoing development in rural areas and specialized environments.

epoch_themes.description: A shift towards systems where AI agents have significant autonomy, reshaping human-machine interactions.
epoch_themes.societal_impact: Redefines job roles, raises ethical questions about AI rights, impacts governance structures.
epoch_themes.global_trends: Increased focus on AI ethics, development of new legal frameworks for AI, and integration of AI into daily life.

epoch_themes.description: Technologies designed to enhance human experience through seamless integration with digital environments.
epoch_themes.societal_impact: Enhances accessibility, changes how we perceive and interact with reality, raises privacy concerns.
epoch_themes.global_trends: Growth in VR/AR markets, advancements in human augmentation, and a push towards more intuitive user interfaces.
